TEXT.TITLE: SAFEGUARD SCIENTIFIC <SFE> IN EQUITY DEAL
TEXT.BODY: Safeguard Scientifics Inc said it made a 2.5 mln dlr equity investment in <Sanchez Computer Associates Inc>, a private computer software firm based in Malvern, Pa. Safeguard said the investment gives it a "major ownership position" in Sanchez, which specializes in software products for financial institutions. Reuter
